metadata.name: Paywall
metadata.description: The Paywall Dapplet seamlessly integrates with Twitter, utilizing the NEAR Protocol and NEAR BOS to display paid content

data:
[{"id":"default","title":"You’re entering Mutable Web","content":"
Mutable Web is a new web3 paradigm that allows anyone to add custom functionality to existing websites and share them within your community— no matter who owns the website.

Become the co-owner of any website you are using!

### Mutation switch

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dapplets/bos-components/main/assets/onboarding-008.png)

Here, you can switch between website mutations created by different communities.

[See more examples on our playground](https://social.dapplets.org/mob.near/widget/ProfilePage?accountId=dappletsproject.near)
"},{"id":"bos.dapplets.near/mutation/Sandbox","title":"Sandbox mutation","content":"
Playground where anyone can inject BOS components.

### Widgets control element

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dapplets/bos-components/main/assets/onboarding-011.png)

EXAMPLE: every post becomes a tray where you can add new application widgets. They become visible to anyone inside your community. This is how the Mutable Web works.

[See more examples on our playground](https://social.dapplets.org/mob.near/widget/ProfilePage?accountId=dappletsproject.near)
"},{"id":"bos.dapplets.near/mutation/Zoo","title":"Zoo mutation","content":"
Mutation with animal icons and buttons.

### Widgets control element

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dapplets/bos-components/main/assets/onboarding-011.png)

EXAMPLE: every post becomes a tray where you can add new application widgets. They become visible to anyone inside your community. This is how the Mutable Web works.

[See more examples on our playground](https://social.dapplets.org/mob.near/widget/ProfilePage?accountId=dappletsproject.near)
"}]
